FirstLaunch.first_launch_notification_label: Oh, this is your first time launching Emilia, let's set it up?
FirstLaunch.pre_first_launch_notification_label: Please note that you are using the pre-release version of Emilia, please report any errors found on GitHub
FirstLaunch.second_page: Choose the AI you want to use
FirstLaunch.use_characterai: Receive the token in the window that opens
FirstLaunch.use_gemini: Get the API key in an open browser window and enter it here
FirstLaunch.enterscharaidata: Set up your first character in the window that opens
FirstLaunch.entervoice: Enter the name of the desired voice

MainWindow.noncriterror: An error has occurred, but the code can continue
MainWindow.criterror: An error has occurred, the code cannot continue

About.whatsnew:
:
• First launch screen, simple initial setup ^_^
• Automatic updates, well, it's clear by name, but you can disable them if you want
• Emilia: Options, most of the settings have been moved here
• VTube Model, better read
• The Character.AI token receipt windows and the Character Editor are now QWidget, which should speed up their opening
• New windows11 theme, available of course only on Windows 11 and above
• And well, a bunch of corrections, additions and other things
About.viewallreleases: To view all previous releases, click here
About.emiopenproject:
Emilia is an open source project that allows you to talk to your favorite Waifu.
At the moment you are using the
